name: Tiny Jetpack Shooters: Online
description:
Welcome to the Tiny Jetpack Shooters world! - online Multiplayer Shooting Game.

Choose your hero and go explore the world around you.

In your journey to become the strongest you will find ton's of weapons, skills, gear and fun.

Play online with friends around the globe or play online with your friends from home.
You will fight routhless bosses along your way and win amazing rewards for your courage.

In order to win you will need to fight endless battels wich become harder and harder - Never give up! get up and fight!
